Returns: Z value of shadow when a view is not focused.
getDynamicShadowUnfocusedZ().Description: Get z value of shadow when a view is not focused.

Returns: Radius of rounded corner in pixels.
getRoundedCornerRadius().Description: Get radius of rounded corner in pixels.

Parameters: float: Number of pixels for unfocused Z value.
float: Number of pixels for focused Z value.
dynamicShadowZ(float, float).Description: Set value of focused and unfocused Z value for shadow.

Parameters: int: Number of pixels of rounded corner radius. Set to 0 to use default settings.
roundedCornerRadius(int).Description: Set value of rounded corner radius.

Returns: Z value of shadow when a view is focused.
getDynamicShadowFocusedZ().Description: Get z value of shadow when a view is focused.
